name: @trosckey/url-params
description: Class for working with URL query string (uses URL.searchparams interface under the hood)

scripts.build: rm -fr dist/* && tsc -p tsconfig-mjs.json && tsc -p tsconfig-cjs.json && ./fixup
scripts.minify: terser --compress ecma=2015 --output dist/mjs/index.min.js -- dist/mjs/index.js && terser --compress ecma=2015 --output dist/cjs/index.min.js -- dist/cjs/index.js

author: trosckey
